item.name: Alarm Notification For : imasSysUp
item.description: Indicates that the iMAS instance is up and active.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : imasSysDown
item.description: Indicates that the iMAS instance is shutting down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : imasDBConn
item.description: Indicates abnormal condition with a database connection pool.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : imasHeartBeat
item.description: Indicates a heartbeat to inform that the application is running normally.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : imasResync
item.description: Indicates start and end of traps resync activity.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsSysUp
item.description: Indicates that the sds instance is up and active.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsSysDown
item.description: Indicates that the sds instance is shutting down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDBConnStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a database connection pool is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapIPCBConnStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IPCB daemon is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapEventQueueStatus
item.description: Indicates that the event queue is above or below high/low water mark.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDBWStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a DB writer instance (TDR interface) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapCGWStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a DB writer instance (Call Gateway) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapSMSCConnStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to an SMSC connection pool is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISAllocFail
item.description: Indicates that allocation of a temporary DNIS mapping failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISRemoveFail
item.description: Indicates that removal of a temporary DNIS mapping failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISInsertFail
item.description: Indicates that insertion of a temporary DNIS mapping failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISLookupFail
item.description: Indicates that lookup of a temporary DNIS mapping failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISPoolExhaust
item.description: Indicates that a named DNIS allocation pool is used up.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsCacheLoadingStatus
item.description: Indicates that loading of a Cache was a success or failure.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFileTransferError
item.description: Indicates a problem with file transfer.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFileRotateFail
item.description: Indicates a problem with file rotation.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFilePollFail
item.description: Indicates that a file poller task was aborted.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFileWriteFail
item.description: Indicates a failure to write to a file.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRoleChange
item.description: Indicates a change in the role of a service instance for a feature

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRecvdTCAPAbortExceeded
item.description: Indicates that Aborts are being received for a high percentage of transactions

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRecvdTCAPErrorExceeded
item.description: Indicates that Return Errors are being received for a high percentage of transactions

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRecvdTCAPRejectExceeded
item.description: Indicates that Rejects are being received for a high percentage of transactions

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapIPProbeStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IP Probe instance is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapEODStatus
item.description: Indicates that SDS EOD execution has failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNetworkKPIStatus
item.description: Indicates that the status of a KPI for a network

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNodeKPIStatus
item.description: Indicates that the status of a KPI for a node

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNetworkKPIWatchStatus
item.description: Indicates that there has been no activity with respect to a KPI for a network

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNodeKPIWatchStatus
item.description: Indicates that there has been no activity with respect to a KPI for a node

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNetworkKPIDelta
item.description: EXPERIMENTAL - WILL CHANGE IN NEXT RELEASE:Indicates that the status of a KPI for a network

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsNodeKPIDelta
item.description: EXPERIMENTAL - WILL CHANGE IN NEXT RELEASE:Indicates that the status of a KPI for a node

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDBPollFail
item.description: Indicates that a database table poller task failed

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapOpenRateStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a OpenRate instance (Rating Engine interface) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapResyncOp
item.description: Indicates that a trap resync operation is in progress.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapHeartbeat
item.description: Heartbeat trap to indicate that a process is alive (severity is always normal).

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapExecFail
item.description: Indicates a failure in execution of some component.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapChargingGatewayStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to the charging gateway is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDNISKPIThresholdCrossed
item.description: Indicates a DNIS KPI threshold breach.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsIPProbeRADIUSConnectionStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IP Probe RADIUS instance is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapLDAPConnStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a LDAP connection pool is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapHTTPStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a HTTP is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiameterPeerAddressStatus
item.description: Indicates that a particular address belonging to a Diameter peer is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiameterPeerStatus
item.description: Indicates that a Diameter peer is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRPCStatus
item.description: Indicates that connection to a RPC module is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapPassivePubClientStatus
item.description: Indicates that Roamware Passive Publisher's client application is disconnected or connected.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFilePollNoFile
item.description: Indicates that a file poller did not find any files for processing for a configured number of sweeps.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsExportImportFailed
item.description: Indicates that export import utility got failed.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapTransportServerStatus
item.description: Indicates that Transport Server is disconnected or connected.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaResponseSendTime
item.description: Indicates high response time for diamter requests made.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaResponseReceiveTime
item.description: Indicates high response time for incomming diamter requests.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaRecvdErrorExceeded
item.description: Indicates high incoming error for outgoing diameter request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaRecvdRequestDelta
item.description: Indicates fluctuation in incoming diameter request count.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaSentRequestTimeout
item.description: Indicates high time out count for outgoing diameter requests.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaSentRequestUnavailable
item.description: Indicates high unavailable count for outgoing diameter request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaGlobalInPeerCongestion
item.description: Indicates Global Peer Congestion for Incoming Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaGlobalInHostCongestion
item.description: Indicates Global Host Congestion for Incoming Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaInPeerCongestion
item.description: Indicates Peer Congestion for Incoming Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaInHostCongestion
item.description: Indicates Host Congestion for Incoming Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaOutPeerCongestion
item.description: Indicates Peer Congestion for Outgoing Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiaOutHostCongestion
item.description: Indicates Peer Congestion for Outgoing Request.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapPassivePubClientStatus2
item.description: Indicates that Roamware Passive Publisher's client application is disconnected or connected.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapCGWStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to a DB writer instance (Call Gateway) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapIPProbeStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IP Probe instance is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDBWStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to a DB writer instance (TDR interface) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapChargingGatewayStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to the charging gateway is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsFileTransferError2
item.description: Indicates a problem with file transfer.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapRPCStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to a RPC module is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapIPCBConnStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IPCB daemon is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapOpenRateStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to a OpenRate instance (Rating Engine interface) is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapSMSCConnStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to an SMSC connection pool is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsIPProbeRADIUSConnectionStatus2
item.description: Indicates that connection to an IP Probe RADIUS instance is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapDiameterPeerAddressStatus2
item.description: Indicates that a particular address belonging to a Diameter peer is up or down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsTrapTransportServerStatus2
item.description: Indicates that Transport Server is disconnected or connected.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsSysNoResp
item.description: Indicates that a service is not responding to the system health monitor.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : sdsSysHeartbeat
item.description: Indicates a heartbeat to inform that the application is running normally.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerSysUp
item.description: Indicates that the Store Server is up and active.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerSysDown
item.description: Indicates that the Store Server is shutting down.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerBusConnStatus
item.description: Indicates the change in availability status of message complex.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerPeerConnStatus
item.description: Indicates the change in peer connection status.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerTrapsResync
item.description: Indicates the start and end of a trap resync operation.

item.name: Alarm Notification For : storeServerHeartbeat
item.description: Sent periodically to indicate that Store Server is alive

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.1$\b)"].str("enterprises.11150.115.5.0.1")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.1$\b)"].nodata(1d)}=0
trigger.name: Indicates that the iMAS instance is up and active.
trigger.description: Indicates that the iMAS instance is up and active.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.2$\b)"].str("enterprises.11150.115.5.0.2")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.2$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0 & {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.1$\b)"].str("enterprises.11150.115.5.0.1")}=0
trigger.name: Indicates that the iMAS instance is shutting down.
trigger.description: Indicates that the iMAS instance is shutting down.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.3$\b)"].str("enterprises.11150.115.5.0.3")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.3$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Indicates abnormal condition with a database connection pool.
trigger.description: Indicates abnormal condition with a database connection pool.

trigger.name: Indicates a heartbeat to inform that the application is running normally.
trigger.description: Indicates a heartbeat to inform that the application is running normally.

trigger.expression: {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.5$\b)"].str("enterprises.11150.115.5.0.5")}=1 & {Template SNMP Traps HGES Nodes:snmptrap["(\benterprises.11150.115.5.0.5$\b)"].nodata(3d)}=0
trigger.name: Indicates start and end of traps resync activity.
trigger.description: Indicates start and end of traps resync activity.
